resources.post: Faith need not be blind.The Shroud gives a sound and genuine reason to believe. We pick up a portion of passion narratives and find confirmation on the shroud. This gives a veracity to the rest of the narratives from the Last supper to Resurrection. You may call it faith but for me it is discernment..
